OPTION.NAME: stdin
OPTION.INFO: Read input data from standard input.

OPTION.NAME: help
OPTION.INFO: Display help message or list of options by category.

OPTION.NAME: allPages
OPTION.INFO: Output all pages.

OPTION.NAME: inputFrom
OPTION.INFO: Specify input data type (otherwise automatically detected from content).

OPTION.NAME: logLevel
OPTION.INFO: Set log level.

OPTION.NAME: outfile
OPTION.INFO: Output file name (use "-" for standard output).

OPTION.NAME: page
OPTION.INFO: Select the page to engrave.

OPTION.NAME: resourcePath
OPTION.INFO: Path to the directory with Verovio resources.

OPTION.NAME: scale
OPTION.INFO: Size of the output SVG notation.

OPTION.NAME: outputTo
OPTION.INFO: Select output data format

OPTION.NAME: version
OPTION.INFO: Display verovio version number.

OPTION.NAME: xmlIdSeed
OPTION.INFO: Seed the random number generator for XML IDs (default is random).

OPTION.NAME: adjustPageHeight
OPTION.INFO: Crop page height to visible height of the SVG.

OPTION.NAME: adjustPageWidth
OPTION.INFO: Crop page width to visible width of the SVG.

OPTION.NAME: breaks
OPTION.INFO: Page and system breaks layout for rendered notation.

OPTION.NAME: breaksSmartSb
OPTION.INFO: In smart breaks mode, portion of system width usage at which an encoded system break will be used.

OPTION.NAME: condense
OPTION.INFO: Control condensed score layout (rules for removing staves on a system that has only rests).

OPTION.NAME: condenseFirstPage
OPTION.INFO: When condensing a score, also condense the first page.

OPTION.NAME: condenseNotLastSystem
OPTION.INFO: Do not condense last system.

OPTION.NAME: condenseTempoPages
OPTION.INFO: When condensing, also condense pages with a tempo change.

OPTION.NAME: evenNoteSpacing
OPTION.INFO: Align notes and rests without adding duration based space.

OPTION.NAME: expand
OPTION.INFO: Expand all referenced elements in expanion.  Input is an xml:id of the expansion list.

OPTION.NAME: footer
OPTION.INFO: Control footer layout

OPTION.NAME: header
OPTION.INFO: Control header layout

OPTION.NAME: humType
OPTION.INFO: Include type attributes when importing rom Humdrum

OPTION.NAME: incip
OPTION.INFO: Read incip elements as data input

OPTION.NAME: justifyVertically
OPTION.INFO: Justify spacing vertically to fill a page.

OPTION.NAME: landscape
OPTION.INFO: Swap values for page height and width.

OPTION.NAME: minLastJustification
OPTION.INFO: Minimum length of last system which can be stretched to 100% width of page.

OPTION.NAME: mmOutput
OPTION.INFO: Use millimeter units in SVG output (default is px).

OPTION.NAME: moveScoreDefinitionToStaff
OPTION.INFO: Move score definition (clef, keySig, meterSig, etc.) from scoreDef to staffDef.

OPTION.NAME: neumeAsNote
OPTION.INFO: Render neumes as noteheads instead of original notation.

OPTION.NAME: noJustification
OPTION.INFO: Do not justify the system (ragged right).

OPTION.NAME: openControlEvents
OPTION.INFO: Render open control events.

OPTION.NAME: outputIndent
OPTION.INFO: Output indent value for MEI and SVG.

OPTION.NAME: outputFormatRaw
OPTION.INFO: Output MEI with no line indents or non-content newlines. See svgFormatRaw.

OPTION.NAME: outputIndentTab
OPTION.INFO: Use tabs rather than spaces for indenting XML output.

OPTION.NAME: outputSmuflXmlEntities
OPTION.INFO: Output SMuFL characters as XML entities instead of hex byte codes.

OPTION.NAME: pageHeight
OPTION.INFO: The page height.

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginBottom
OPTION.INFO: Page bottom margin

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginLeft
OPTION.INFO: Page left margin.

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginRight
OPTION.INFO: Page right margin.

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginTop
OPTION.INFO: Page top margin.

OPTION.NAME: pageWidth
OPTION.INFO: Page width

OPTION.NAME: pedalStyle
OPTION.INFO: Global pedal style

OPTION.NAME: preserveAnalyticalMarkup
OPTION.INFO: Preserves analytical markup in MEI.

OPTION.NAME: removeIds
OPTION.INFO: Remove XML IDs in the MEI output when not referenced.

OPTION.NAME: scaleToPageSize
OPTION.INFO: Scale content with page instead of scaling page itself.

OPTION.NAME: setLocale
OPTION.INFO: Changes the global locale to C (this is not thread-safe).

OPTION.NAME: showRuntime
OPTION.INFO: Display processing time.

OPTION.NAME: shrinkToFit
OPTION.INFO: Scale down page content to fit page height, if needed.

OPTION.NAME: smuflTextFont
OPTION.INFO: Specify if the SMuFL text font access.

OPTION.NAME: staccato-center
OPTION.INFO: Align staccato and staccatissimo articulations with center of note.

OPTION.NAME: svgBoundingBoxes
OPTION.INFO: Include bounding boxes in SVG output.

OPTION.NAME: svgCss
OPTION.INFO: CSS to embed in SVG output.

OPTION.NAME: svgViewBox
OPTION.INFO: Use viewbox on SVG root element for easy scaling of document.

OPTION.NAME: svgHtml5
OPTION.INFO: Write data-id and data-class attributes for JS usage and ID clash avoidance.

OPTION.NAME: svgFormatRaw
OPTION.INFO: Write SVG with no line indenting or non-content newlines. See outputFormatRaw.

OPTION.NAME: svgRemoveXlink
OPTION.INFO: Removes the "xlink:" prefix from href attributes for compatibility with some newer browsers.

OPTION.NAME: svgAdditionalAttribute
OPTION.INFO: Add additional attributes for graphical elements in SVG as "data-*".  For example: "note@pname" adds "data-pname to all note elements.

OPTION.NAME: unit
OPTION.INFO: The MEI unit (1/2 of the distance between the staff lines).

OPTION.NAME: useBraceGlyph
OPTION.INFO: Use brace glyph from current font.

OPTION.NAME: useFacsimile
OPTION.INFO: Use information in the facsimile element to control the layout.

OPTION.NAME: usePgFooterForAll
OPTION.INFO: Use the pgFooter element for all pages.

OPTION.NAME: usePgHeaderForAll
OPTION.INFO: Use the pgHeader element for all pages.

OPTION.NAME: xmlIdChecksum
OPTION.INFO: Seed XML ID generator using checkoug of input data

OPTION.NAME: barLineSeparation
OPTION.INFO: Default distance between multiple barlines when locked together.

OPTION.NAME: barLineWidth
OPTION.INFO: Width of barlines.

OPTION.NAME: beamFrenchStyle
OPTION.INFO: Note stems stop at first beam rather than last.

OPTION.NAME: beamMaxSlope
OPTION.INFO: Maximum beam slope.

OPTION.NAME: beamMixedPreserve
OPTION.INFO: Mixed beams will be drawn even if there is not enough space.

OPTION.NAME: beamMixedStemMin
OPTION.INFO: Minimal stem length in diatonic steps for mixed beams.

OPTION.NAME: bracketThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of system brackets.

OPTION.NAME: breaksNoWidow
OPTION.INFO: Prevent single measures on last page by fitting on previous page.

OPTION.NAME: dashedBarLineDashLength
OPTION.INFO: Dashed barline dash length.

OPTION.NAME: dashedBarLineGapLength
OPTION.INFO: Dashed barline gap length.

OPTION.NAME: dynamDist
OPTION.INFO: Distance from staff for dynamic marks

OPTION.NAME: dynamSingleGlyphs
OPTION.INFO: Do not use SMuFL dynamics glyph combinations.

OPTION.NAME: engravingDefaults
OPTION.INFO: Default options for engraving SMuFL font as JSON string.

OPTION.NAME: engravingDefaultsFile
OPTION.INFO: Path to JSON file for engraving SMuFL font as JSON string.

OPTION.NAME: extenderLineMinSpace
OPTION.INFO: Minimum space required for extender line to be drawn.

OPTION.NAME: fingeringScale
OPTION.INFO: Scale of fingering numbers compared to default font size.

OPTION.NAME: font
OPTION.INFO: Set the music font.

OPTION.NAME: fontAddCustom
OPTION.INFO: Add a custom music font as zip file.

OPTION.NAME: fontFallback
OPTION.INFO: Fallback music font for missing glyphs

OPTION.NAME: fontLoadAll
OPTION.INFO: Load all music fonts.

OPTION.NAME: graceFactor
OPTION.INFO: Size of grace notes relative to regular notes.

OPTION.NAME: graceRhythmAlign
OPTION.INFO: Align grace notes rhythmically with all staves.

OPTION.NAME: graceRightAlign
OPTION.INFO: Align the right position of a grace group with all staves.

OPTION.NAME: hairpinSize
OPTION.INFO: Size of hairpins (crescendo lines) in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: hairpinThickness
OPTION.INFO: Hairpin thickness (crescendo lines) in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: handwrittenFont
OPTION.INFO: Handwriting fonts that require special handling.

OPTION.NAME: harmDist
OPTION.INFO: Default distance from harmonic labels to the staff.

OPTION.NAME: justificationStaff
OPTION.INFO: Vertical staff justification.

OPTION.NAME: justificationSystem
OPTION.INFO: System spacing justification.

OPTION.NAME: justificationBracketGroup
OPTION.INFO: Space between staves inside a bracket group justification.

OPTION.NAME: justificationBraceGroup
OPTION.INFO: Space between staves inside a brace group justification.

OPTION.NAME: justificationMaxVertical
OPTION.INFO: Maximum ratio of justifiable height to page height that can be used for the vertical justification.

OPTION.NAME: ledgerLineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of ledger lines (diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: ledgerLineExtension
OPTION.INFO: Amount by which ledger lines should extend on either side of a notehead (diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: lyricElision
OPTION.INFO: Lyric elision width.

OPTION.NAME: lyricHeightFactor
OPTION.INFO: Lyric verse line height factor.

OPTION.NAME: lyricLineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Lyric verse line height factor.

OPTION.NAME: lyricNoStartHyphen
OPTION.INFO: Do not show hyphens at beginning of system

OPTION.NAME: lyricSize
OPTION.INFO: Size of lyric text in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: lyricTopMinMargin
OPTION.INFO: Minmal margin above lyrics (in diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: lyricWordSpace
OPTION.INFO: Minimum width of spaces separating lyrics syllables.

OPTION.NAME: lyricVerseCollapse
OPTION.INFO: Remove unused verse numbers from score.

OPTION.NAME: measureMinWidth
OPTION.INFO: Minimal measure width in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: mnumInterval
OPTION.INFO: Repeat measure numbers at the given cycle size.

OPTION.NAME: multiRestStyle
OPTION.INFO: Rendering style of multiple measure rests.

OPTION.NAME: multiRestThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of multi rest in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: octaveAlternativeSymbols
OPTION.INFO: Use alternative symbols for displaying octaves.

OPTION.NAME: octaveLineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Octave line thickness.

OPTION.NAME: octaveNoSpanningParentheses
OPTION.INFO: Do not add parentheses around octaves after system breaks.

OPTION.NAME: pedalLineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Line thickness for piano pedalling in diatonci steps.

OPTION.NAME: repeatBarLineDotSeparation
OPTION.INFO: Default horizontal distance between dots and inner repeat barline.

OPTION.NAME: repeatEndingLineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Repeat and endling line thickness in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: slurCurveFactor
OPTION.INFO: Higher values mean rounder slurs.

OPTION.NAME: slurEndpointFlexibility
OPTION.INFO: Allow more endpoint movement during adjustment.

OPTION.NAME: slurEndpointThickness
OPTION.INFO: Slur endpoint thickness in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: slurMargin
OPTION.INFO: Slur padding in diatonic steps to avoid obstacles.

OPTION.NAME: slurMaxSlope
OPTION.INFO: Maximum slur slope in degrees.

OPTION.NAME: slurMidpointThickness
OPTION.INFO: Slur midpoint thickness in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: slurSymmetry
OPTION.INFO: High value means more symmetric slurs.

OPTION.NAME: spacingBraceGroup
OPTION.INFO: Minimum space between staves inside of a braced group in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: spacingBracketGroup
OPTION.INFO: Minimum space between staves inside a bracketed group in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: spacingDurDetection
OPTION.INFO: Detect long duration for adjusting spacing.

OPTION.NAME: spacingLinear
OPTION.INFO: Specify the linear spacing factor.

OPTION.NAME: spacingNonLinear
OPTION.INFO: Ratio of spacing between rhythmic levels (such as width of quarter note compared to eighth note).

OPTION.NAME: spacingStaff
OPTION.INFO: The staff minimal spacing

OPTION.NAME: spacingSystem
OPTION.INFO: Minimum spacing between systems in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: staffLineWidth
OPTION.INFO: Staff line width in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: stemWidth
OPTION.INFO: The stem width of notes in diaontic steps.

OPTION.NAME: subBracketThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of system sub-brackets in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: systemDivider
OPTION.INFO: Display style of system dividers.

OPTION.NAME: systemMaxPerPage
OPTION.INFO: Maximum number of systems per page.

OPTION.NAME: textEnclosureThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of text-enclosing boxes in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: thickBarlineThickness
OPTION.INFO: Thickness of thick barlines in diatonic steps.

OPTION.NAME: tieEndpointThickness
OPTION.INFO: Endpoint tie thickeness (diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: tieMidpointThickness
OPTION.INFO: Tie midpoint thickeness (in diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: tieMinLength
OPTION.INFO: Midpoint tie thickness (in diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: tupletAngledOnBeams
OPTION.INFO: Tuplet brackets angled on beams only.

OPTION.NAME: tupletBracketThickness
OPTION.INFO: Tuplet bracket thickness in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: tupletNumHead
OPTION.INFO: Place tuplet number on notehead-side.

OPTION.NAME: appXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set xPath query for selecting app child elements. By default first lem or rdg is selected.

OPTION.NAME: choiceXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set xPath query for selecting choice child elements. By default first child is selected.

OPTION.NAME: loadSelectedMdivOnly
OPTION.INFO: Load only the selected mdif; the content of other mdivs are skipped.

OPTION.NAME: mdivAll
OPTION.INFO: Load and render all mdiv elements (movements/works).

OPTION.NAME: mdivXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set xPath query for selecting mdiv to be rendered, only one mdiv can be rendered.

OPTION.NAME: substXPAthQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set xPath query for selecting subst child elements.  By default first child is selected

OPTION.NAME: transpose
OPTION.INFO: Transpose the entire content

OPTION.NAME: transposeMdiv
OPTION.INFO: JSON mapping mdiv IDs to corresponding transposition

OPTION.NAME: transposeSelectedOnly
OPTION.INFO: Transpose only selected content and ignore unselected editorial content.

OPTION.NAME: transposeToSoundingPitch
OPTION.INFO: Transpose to sounding pitch by evaluating @trans.semi

OPTION.NAME: defaultBottomMargin
OPTION.INFO: Default bottom margin.

OPTION.NAME: defaultLeftMargin
OPTION.INFO: Default left margin.

OPTION.NAME: defaultRightMargin
OPTION.INFO: Default right margin.

OPTION.NAME: defaultTopMargin
OPTION.INFO: Default top margin.

OPTION.NAME: bottomMarginArtic
OPTION.INFO: Bottom margin for articulations in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: bottomMarginHarm
OPTION.INFO: Bottom margin for harmony labels in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: bottomMarginOctave
OPTION.INFO: Margin for octave (diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: bottomMarginHeader
OPTION.INFO: Bottom margin for page headers in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginAccid
OPTION.INFO: The margin for accid (diatonic steps).

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for barlines in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginBeatRpt
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for beat repetition symbols in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginChord
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for chords in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginClef
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for clefs in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginKeySig
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for key signatures in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginLeftBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for left barlines in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMensur
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for mensuration signs.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMeterSig
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for time signatures.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMRest
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for measure rests in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMRpt2
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for two-measure repeat signs in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMultiRest
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for multi-bar rests in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMultiRpt
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for multi-bar repeats in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginNote
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for note.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginRest
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for rest in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginRightBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for right barLine.

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginTabDurSym
OPTION.INFO: Left margin for tabDurSym.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginAccid
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for accidentals.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for barlines in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginBeatRpt
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for beat repeat symbols in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginChord
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for chords.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginClef
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for clefs.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginKeySig
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for key signatures.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginLeftBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for left barlines in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMensur
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for mensuration signs.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMeterSig
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for time signatures.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMRest
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for full-measure rests in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMRpt2
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for two-measure repeat symbols in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMultiRest
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for multi-bar rests in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMultiRpt
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for multi-measure repeat signs in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginNote
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for notes.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginRest
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for rests.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginRightBarLine
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for right barLine.

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginTabDurSym
OPTION.INFO: Right margin for tabDurSym in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: topMarginArtic
OPTION.INFO: Top margin for articulations in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: topMarginHarm
OPTION.INFO: Top margin for harmony labels in diatonic-step units.

OPTION.NAME: topMarginPgFooter
OPTION.INFO: Top margin for page footer.

OPTION.NAME: midiNoCue
OPTION.INFO: Skip cue notes in MIDI output.

OPTION.NAME: midiTempoAdjustment
OPTION.INFO: MIDI tempo adjustment factor.

OPTION.NAME: durationEquivalence
OPTION.INFO: Mensural duration equivalence.

OPTION.NAME: ligatureAsBracket
OPTION.INFO: Render ligatures as bracket instead of as ligature.

OPTION.NAME: mensuralResponsiveView
OPTION.INFO: Convert mensural content to more responsive view reduced to the selected markup.

OPTION.NAME: mensuralToCmn
OPTION.INFO: Convert mensural sections to CMN measure-based.

OPTION.NAME: mensuralScoreUp
OPTION.INFO: Score up the mensural voices providing a dur.quality to the notes.

OPTION.NAME: timemapOptions
OPTION.INFO: JSON options for producing timemap.
